_comment: Configuration for Translation Builder - Manual Edition

_settings_explained.max_pages: Maximum number of pages to scrape from che168 API (20 pages = ~400 cars)
_settings_explained.page_size: Number of cars per page (che168 default: 20)
_settings_explained.min_delay: Minimum delay in seconds between requests (anti-detection)
_settings_explained.max_delay: Maximum delay in seconds between requests (random range)
_settings_explained.max_requests_per_proxy: Max requests before rotating to next proxy

conservative._note: Safest option, slower but minimal detection risk

balanced._note: Default - good balance of speed and safety

_term_categories.brands: Short brand names like 奔驰, 宝马, 奥迪
_term_categories.specs: Technical specs like 排量, 变速箱, 驱动方式
_term_categories.features: Car features like 天窗, 座椅, 导航
